text:
PastBook - Amsterdam, NL - Full Time Hands-On CTO / Tech Lead / Product Developer

We offer salary + equity.

PastBook is on a mission to help people reliving their memories. We are VC backed - rebuilding the team from scratch and looking for engineer #1. We can sponsor VISA, but just after a trial period of few months. No remote.

More info here: http://www.pastbook.com/txt/job-offers/#cto

Interested? Write to work@pastbook.com
